name: webdriverio-pom-jenkins
description: This is POM framework with webdriverio and integration with git,jenkins

scripts.report-generate-open: allure generate --clean allure-results && allure open allure-report
scripts.pretest: rimraf allure-results && rimraf allure-report && rimraf test-screenshots && rimraf wdio-logs
scripts.pretestSuites: rimraf allure-results && rimraf allure-report && rimraf test-screenshots && rimraf wdio-logs

author: sanchita loho
